getEthereumPrice().details: Reverts if the answer from Chainlink is not safe

getMinimumPrice().details: Reverts if none of the Chainlink nodes are safe

params._feed: The address of the Chainlink price feed

getEthereumPrice().notice: Retrieves the current price of ETH/USD as provided by Chainlink

getMinimumPrice().notice: Retrieves the minimum price of the 3pool tokens as provided by Chainlink

getSafeAnswer(address).notice: Get and check the answer provided by Chainlink
